text: The 1989 Loma Prieta Earthquake was an earthquake that took place in the San Francisco Bay Area. It happened on October 17, 1989, at 5:04 p.m. The earthquake caused over 67 deaths. It caused billions of dollars worth of property damage. The earthquake happened during one of the games of the 1989 World Series. Because of that, it is sometimes called the "World Series Quake". ==References== Loma Prieta Earthquake Loma Prieta Earthquake Category:1980s in California Category:Earthquakes in the 1980s Category:Earthquakes in California Category:Natural disasters in the San Francisco Bay Area
title: 1989 Loma Prieta earthquake
